lines.text: Camille, Aunt Jewel shot herself.
We don't know that Aunt Jewel shot herself.
What do you mean?
All we know was that Aunt Jewel was shot, period.
But - but the gun was in her hand. She must have - must have -
Don't always go for the obvious, Cora. Just think!
What are you eating?

Nothin'. Now, you just listen to me, all right? Aunt Jewel did not commit suicide. Nobody in this family commits suicide. Suicide is a disgrace. Only crazy people commit suicide. So if that's what come - some robber, some murderer is trying to make this look like, well, forget that you saw the gun in her hand, you hear me? It was not there. Aunt Jewel did not commit suicide.
He's innocent.
And what makes you so sure of that?
I've fished with him.
So I'm part black!
[playing Scrabble in Willis's cell]
"A-we". Triple word, that's it, I'm out.
"A-we"? A-we? A-we is not a word!
[He hits the table, upsetting the board and scattering letters everywhere]
AWE, Lester, "awe". From Old Norse, derived from the reconstructed Indo-European base "Agh!" A combination of fear, reverence, and wonder.
[the police lab reports that Camille is a hemophiliac]
A condition under which, in times of extreme stress, her blood will not clot properly. Emma, Camille Dixon is your aunt, isn't she?
Unfortunately.
You ever seen her suffer from this condition?
Unfortunately not.
